about_the_game:
Spherical Open World Scene: Adventuring and Development on Planets of Various Sizes

In the vast cosmos, the lonely Ruihe Star System contains countless stars. Monaem is an edge planet of the Kuntai star, inhabited by four major races: Humans, Elves, Orcs, and Dwarves. These races exist independently but interact with each other. Yet, destiny and eternal confusion, the temptation of power and glory, have led to countless alliances that were repeatedly established and dissolved. Peace and conflict have never ceased...

Activities: Farming, Fishing, Random Gear Attributes, Freely Combined Skills

In the 16th century of the Terminal Age, an unknown evil dark force began to invade this planet. To combat this dark power, the great wizard Aldrich once again united the four races to forge a pact and created four rings with infinite elemental magic. These rings were entrusted to pure souls with the hope that they would unite to fight the evil forces. However, the dark forces, aware of this, began to corrupt the restless souls...

The Bearers of Destiny's Rings: Gather the strongest gear and embark on an adventure!

name: WAW WORLD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-10400F CPU @ 2.90GHz 2.90 GHz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 1030
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • VR Support: 否
  • Additional Notes: 无

short_description: Open World Adventure: Spherical Planet Scene, Four-Race World
